TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataFormats extends System.Object
public ref class DataFormats abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataFormats extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 预定义的 格式名称。
使用它们来标识存储在 中的数据的格式。

span.span: Use them to identify the format of data that you store in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 类还使用 `static` 格式列表来确定从系统 检索的数据类型，或者在拖放操作中传输的数据的类型。The and classes also use the `static` format list to determine the type of data that is retrieved from the system , or that is transferred in a drag-and-drop operation. 方法使你能够：The method allows you to: - 获取格式名或 ID 号的预定义的 对象。Get a predefined object for a format name or ID number. - 向此类中的 `static` 列表添加新的格式名称/ID 号对，并在向其传递格式名称时将格式作为 格式注册到 Windows 注册表。Add a new format name/ID number pair to the `static` list in this class, and to register the format with the Windows registry as a format when you pass it the format name. 可以从 实例中的相应属性获取 号或格式 。You can get the number or format from the appropriate property in the instance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为 `myFormat`的新数据格式。The following code example creates a new data format named `myFormat`. 然后，该代码创建一个 `MyNewObject`，它在 中存储。The code then creates a `MyNewObject` which it stores in a . 将 复制到 。The is copied to the . 接下来，从 中检索 ，并恢复 `MyNewObject`。Next, the is retrieved from the and the `MyNewObject` is recovered. 在文本框中打印 `MyNewObject` 的值。The value of the `MyNewObject` is printed in a text box. 此代码要求已创建 `textBox1` 并将其放置在窗体上。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic DataFormats Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataFormats Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataFormats Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Bitmap As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 位图格式。
此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位图将计算机图形表示为内存中的位数组，这些位表示图像中单个像素的特性。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image. 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

span.span: Specifies a comma-separated value (CSV) format, which is a common interchange format used by spreadsheets.

summary.span: Windows 窗体不直接使用此格式。

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dib As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 与设备无关的位图 (DIB) 格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows device-independent bitmap (DIB) format.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks DIB 是一种文件格式，旨在确保使用一个应用程序创建的位图图形可以在其他应用程序中加载和显示，就像它们在原始应用程序中出现的方式一样。DIB is a file format designed to ensure that bitmapped graphics created using one application can be loaded and displayed in another application exactly the way they appeared in the originating application. 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dif As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 数据交换格式 (DIF)，Windows 窗体不直接使用此格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows Data Interchange Format (DIF), which Windows Forms does not directly use.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks DIF 是 ASCII 代码的一种格式，在该格式中，可以构造数据库、电子表格和类似的文档，以方便使用和传输到其他程序。DIF is a format consisting of ASCII codes in which database, spreadsheet, and similar documents can be structured to facilitate their use by and transfer to other programs. 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. [!code-cpp[DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue/CPP/dataformats_dif.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue/CS/dataformats_dif.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_CommaSeparatedValue/VB/dataformats_dif.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly EnhancedMetafile As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 增强型图元文件格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows enhanced metafile format.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图元文件格式是一个 Windows 文件，它以图形对象而不是像素来存储图像。The metafile format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 调整大小时，图元文件会保持图像比位图更好。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. > [!NOTE] > 使用带有剪贴板的图元文件格式时，可能需要特别注意。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the clipboard. 由于 类的当前实现中存在限制，因此使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别 .NET Framework 使用的图元文件格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在这种情况下，必须与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口（Api）进行互操作。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FileDrop As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 文件放置格式，Windows 窗体不直接使用此格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows file drop format, which Windows Forms does not directly use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拖放操作过程中，可以使用此格式与 shell 文件拖动进行交互。You can use this format to interact with shell file drags during drag-and-drop operations. 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

summary.span: 返回带有 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID 和名称的 。

span.span: Returns a with the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats/Format GetFormat(int32 id) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetFormat (id As Integer) As DataFormats.Format

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 为指定的 ID 返回带有 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID 和名称的 。

span.span: Returns a with the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and name for the specified ID.

returns.span: 一个 ，它具有 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID 和格式的名称。

span.span: A that has the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and the name of the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员通常用于注册本机剪贴板格式。This member is typically used to register native Clipboard formats. 当要检索包含 ID/格式名称对的 实例时，请使用 ID 号调用 。Call with an ID number when you want to retrieve a instance that contains the ID/format name pair. 通常，ID 名称和编号由您正在使用 与进行交互的应用程序的创建者发布。Typically, the ID name and number is published by the creator of the application that you are using the to interface with. 例如，Visual Basic 中动态数据交换（DDE）对话信息的 ID 号为 `&HBF00`，格式名为 `vbCFLink`。For example, the ID number for Dynamic Data Exchange (DDE) conversation information in Visual Basic is `&HBF00`, and the format name is `vbCFLink`. 用任何唯一 ID 号调用此方法，以将 ID/格式名称对添加到 类中格式名称/ID 对 `static` 列表。Call this method with any unique ID number to add the ID/format name pair to the `static` list of format name/ID pairs in the class. 将通过串联 "Format" 和 ID 号来创建新名称。The new name will be created by concatenating "Format" and the ID number. 由于未提供名称，此对未注册为新的 格式。This pair is not registered as a new format because you have not provided a name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. [!code-cpp[DataFormats_GetFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_GetFormat/CPP/dataformats_getformat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataFormats_GetFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_GetFormat/CS/dataformats_getformat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataFormats_GetFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_GetFormat/VB/dataformats_getformat.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats/Format GetFormat(string format) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetFormat (format As String) As DataFormats.Format

summary.span: 为指定的格式返回带有 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID 和名称的 。

span.span: Returns a with the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and name for the specified format.

returns.span: 一个 ，它具有 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID 和格式的名称。

span.span: A that has the Windows Clipboard numeric ID and the name of the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要现有格式的 Windows 剪贴板数字 ID，请使用格式名称调用 。Call with the format name when you need a Windows Clipboard numeric ID for an existing format. 使用自己的格式名调用此方法以创建新的 格式类型。Call this method with your own format name to create a new format type. 如果指定的格式不存在，此方法将使用 Windows 注册表将该名称注册为剪贴板格式，并获取唯一的格式标识符。If the specified format does not exist, this method will register the name as a Clipboard format with the Windows registry and get a unique format identifier. 此新名称/ID 对将添加到 类中格式名称/ID 对 `static` 列表。This new name/ID pair will be added to the `static` list of format name/ID pairs in the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检索表示格式名称/ID 对的 。The following code example shows how to retrieve a representing a format name/ID pair. 请求 格式，检索 的内容显示在文本框中。The format is requested, and the contents of the retrieved are displayed in a text box. 此代码需要实例化 `textBox1`。This code requires `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataFormats.GetFormat Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 注册新的 格式失败。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口和 类使用此字段来指示 CF_HTML 剪贴板数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to indicate the CF_HTML clipboard data type. 有关此格式的详细信息，请参阅[HTML 剪贴板格式](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198813)。For more information about this format, see [HTML Clipboard Format](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198813). 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图元文件格式是一个 Windows 文件，它以图形对象而不是像素来存储图像。The metafile format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 调整大小时，图元文件会保持图像比位图更好。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. > [!NOTE] > 使用带有剪贴板的图元文件格式时，可能需要特别注意。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the clipboard. 由于 类的当前实现中存在限制，因此使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别 .NET Framework 使用的图元文件格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在这种情况下，必须与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口（Api）进行互操作。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks RIFF 是一种基于广泛的规范，设计用于为不同类型的多媒体文件定义标准格式。RIFF is a broad-based specification, designed to be used in defining standard formats for different types of multimedia files. 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Rtf As String

summary.span: 指定由 RTF 数据组成的文本。

span.span: Specifies text consisting of Rich Text Format (RTF) data.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks RTF 是用于在应用程序之间传输格式化文本文档的文档内容体系结构的改写。RTF is an adaptation of Document Content Architecture that is used for transferring formatted text documents between applications. 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. 有关 RTF 格式的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN library 中的 https://msdn.microsoft.com/library的 Rtf 格式规范。For more information about the RTF format, see the Rich Text Format specification in the MSDN library at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Serializable As String

summary.span: 指定封装任何类型的 Windows 窗体对象的格式。

span.span: Specifies a format that encapsulates any type of Windows Forms object.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. > [!NOTE] > 可序列化格式特定于 Windows 窗体，并将不会被在 Windows 窗体之外创建的应用程序识别。The serializable format is specific to Windows Forms only and will not be recognized by applications created outside of Windows Forms.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly StringFormat As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 窗体字符串类格式，Windows 窗体使用此格式存储字符串对象。

span.span: Specifies the Windows Forms string class format, which Windows Forms uses to store string objects.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods. > [!NOTE] > String 类格式仅特定于 Windows 窗体，且不会被在 Windows 窗体之外创建的应用程序识别。The string class format is specific to Windows Forms only and will not be recognized by applications created outside of Windows Forms. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. [!code-cpp[DataFormats_StringFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_StringFormat/CPP/dataformats_stringformat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataFormats_StringFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_StringFormat/CS/dataformats_stringformat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataFormats_StringFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataFormats_StringFormat/VB/dataformats_stringformat.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SymbolicLink As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 符号链接格式，Windows 窗体不直接使用此格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows symbolic link format, which Windows Forms does not directly use.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 符号链接是一个磁盘目录项，它取代了文件的目录条目，但实际上是对其他目录中的文件的引用。A symbolic link is a disk directory entry that takes the place of a directory entry for a file, but is actually a reference to a file in a different directory. 符号链接也称为别名、快捷方式、软链接或符号链接。A symbolic link is also called an alias, shortcut, soft link, or symlink. 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Tiff As String

summary.span: 指定标记图像文件格式 (TIFF)，Windows 窗体不直接使用此格式。

span.span: Specifies the Tagged Image File Format (TIFF), which Windows Forms does not directly use.

summary.span: 此 字段是只读的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks TIFF 是一种标准文件格式，通常用于扫描、存储和交换灰度图形图像。TIFF is a standard file format commonly used for scanning, storage, and interchanges of gray-scale graphic images. 接口和 类使用此字段来指定数据类型。This field is used by the interface and the class to specify the data type. 添加到 或 的实现时，请将此字段用作 和 方法的格式。When adding to an or to an implementation of , use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要查看此类型的对象是否存在，请使用此字段作为 和 方法的格式。To see if an object of this type exists, use this field as the format for the and methods. 若要获取此类型的对象，请使用此格式作为 和 方法的格式。To get an object of this type, use this as the format for the and methods.
